name: MSinceMostRecentTradeOpen
description: Months Since Most Recent Trade Open

name: MaxDelq2PublicRecLast12M
description: Max Delq/Public Records Last 12 Months. See tab "MaxDelq" for each category

name: MaxDelqEver
description: Max Delinquency Ever. See tab "MaxDelq" for each category

name: NumTotalTrades
description: Number of Total Trades (total number of credit accounts)

name: NumTradesOpeninLast12M
description: Number of Trades Open in Last 12 Months

name: MSinceMostRecentInqexcl7days
description: Months Since Most Recent Inq excl 7days

name: NumInqLast6Mexcl7days
description: Number of Inq Last 6 Months excl 7days. Excluding the last 7 days removes inquiries that are likely due to price comparision shopping.

name: NetFractionRevolvingBurden
description: Net Fraction Revolving Burden. This is revolving balance divided by credit limit

name: NetFractionInstallBurden
description: Net Fraction Installment Burden. This is installment balance divided by original loan amount

name: NumBank2NatlTradesWHighUtilization
description: Number Bank/Natl Trades w high utilization ratio

name: RiskPerformance
description: Paid as negotiated flag (12-36 Months). 0 is for Good and 1 is for Bad
